title: No WiFi preference option for WiFi call since Android 11
content:
Hello,
I have a Pixel 3a with German Telekom.
Since Android 11 update I have in the settings no option to choose between WiFi preferred or Mobile preferred.
Why this happens? Currently the phone choosing then automatically mobile call so I cannot use Wi-fi call.
Is this a known bug that the option is missing?
Thanks in advance.
